text:
I'm trying to build my documentation but keep getting the following error
```ERROR: `NonlinearSchrodinger=b3fbeaf7-5746-403c-a6b7-06939dc82746` depends on `TerminalLoggers`, but no such entry exists in the manifest.```
I already removed that dependency hence why it's not in my manifest, but documenter keeps insisting the project depends on it. Any idea how to fix this?

elements.text: I'm trying to build my documentation but keep getting the following error
ERROR: `NonlinearSchrodinger=b3fbeaf7-5746-403c-a6b7-06939dc82746` depends on `TerminalLoggers`, but no such entry exists in the manifest.
I already removed that dependency hence why it's not in my manifest, but documenter keeps insisting the project depends on it. Any idea how to fix this?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/55041| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
It _is_ a dependency of NonlinearSchrodinger.jl as far as I can tell, so it needs to be in the manifest

elements.text: a dependency of NonlinearSchrodinger.jl as far as I can tell, so it needs to be in the manifest

text: But basically it looks like your manifest/env is a bit out of sync.. resolving it again probably would fix it?

elements.text: But basically it looks like your manifest/env is a bit out of sync.. resolving it again probably would fix it?

text: `resolve` unfortunately says no changes to either the manifest or the project

elements.text: unfortunately says no changes to either the manifest or the project

text: And it errors if I run it in the docs environment (the same error about the dependency)

elements.text: And it errors if I run it in the docs environment (the same error about the dependency)

text: Is there a way to rebuild the whole environment somehow? I don't know why it insists TerminalLoggers is still a dependency,

elements.text: Is there a way to rebuild the whole environment somehow? I don't know why it insists TerminalLoggers is still a dependency,

text: It's not used anywhere, not in the project or the manifest of either the main package or the docs environment or anywhere I can find.

elements.text: It's not used anywhere, not in the project or the manifest of either the main package or the docs environment or anywhere I can find.

text: you can just delete the `docs/Manifest.toml` and re-instantiate the environment
Hmmm that doesn't seem to work either unfortunately, same error, it's quite weird

elements.text: Hmmm that doesn't seem to work either unfortunately, same error, it's quite weird

text: Wait sorry the error is that my package isn't registered (yet)

elements.text: Wait sorry the error is that my package isn't registered (yet)

text: I added terminal loggers back in as a dependency and the error is still there, it is so weird.

elements.text: I added terminal loggers back in as a dependency and the error is still there, it is so weird.

text: I had to edit docs/Manifest.toml by hand unfortunately, I found the dependency there. Now it throws a warning about a missing dependency but otherwise works (and breaks again if I add it by hand in the manifest, I need to fix this somehow)
